abstract.p: The objective of this study is to assess annual report information needs, to evaluate disclosure practices in relation to these needs, and to examine how corporate size and industry variables affect disclosure. Many disclosure deficiencies are found to exist in annual reports. Corporate size plays a minor role and industry group a major role in explaining differences in disclosure for the firms studied.
